name: Tall Order (itch)
description:
Tall Order

Tall Order is a casual physics-based waitering game. You are an overworked waiter saving up to finally take that dream vacation to Hawaii. All you need to do now is serve as many meals to your clients as possible.

This was done for the 49th Ludum Dare. The theme was Unstable.


Guide/Tutorial:

Move with the WASD keys or the arrow keys.

Press the i key to open the store.

When customers walk in look at the order indicator above their heads to know what food they want. Use your tray to carry food from the kitchen to your customers. Be aware of the timer next to customers. It indicates how much longer they are willing to wait. Complete orders to make money.

Credits:

Art: Laura (Catalow)

Programming: Timothy (BossManta)

Game Engine: Godot

Music: Le Baguette by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com)
